name: Aviation Career Center
about: Aviation Career Center is a premier institution for integrated pilot training, offering EASA-approved programs designed to guide aspiring pilots from the outset to a successful aviation career. With airline-experienced instructors and staff, our training includes the EASA 0 to ATPL course, complete with A-UPRT and MCC, as well as a guaranteed Airbus A320 Cadet Program that ensures placement in an A320 airline operator. Located in the heart of Europe, we provide a comprehensive training environment at a fully-equipped international airport, along with support for visa and housing arrangements. Our modular training courses and high employment rate of graduates make us a trusted partner for those seeking a career in aviation. We are dedicated to helping you achieve your flying dreams.
services:
["Initial Single Engine Flight Training
ATPL Theory and Cross Country Flying
Multi engine Instrument Flight Training
Commercial Pilot Training"]
